items.title: Prêmio Multishow 2025 consagra João Gomes e faz homenagem para Gilberto Gil

items.summary: O Prêmio Multishow 2025 consagrou João Gomes como o principal artista do ano na música brasileira. O cantor venceu cinco categorias da premiação musical da Globo, que ocorreu nesta terça-feira (10). Quatro delas com o seu projeto "Dominguinho", juntamente com Jotapê e Mestrinho. Leia mais (12/10/2025 - 00h30)

items.title: Figurino futurista de Wendy chama atenção em premiação
items.title_zh: 温迪的未来时装在奖项中引起了人们的关注
items.summary: Vestidos longos e justos, blusas com brilhos e macacões coloridos. No tapete vermelho do Prêmio Multishow, o figurino dos famosos manteve uma linha discreta. A única exceção foi a irmã mais nova de Lexa. A cantora Wendy apostou no look 'neném futurista'. Leia mais (12/10/2025 - 00h08)

items.title: PL da Dosimetria permite que condenados por coação, incêndio e outros crimes saiam antes da prisão

Leia mais (12/10/2025 - 00h01)

items.summary: O Brasil ocupa o quinto lugar entre 216 países em novo relatório global sobre desigualdade de renda. Leia mais (12/09/2025 - 23h59)

items.title: Preso por atropelar e arrastar Tainara é levado para cadeia em Guarulhos, na Grande SP
items.title_zh: 因奔跑和拖拽Tainara而被捕，在大SP的Guarulhos被关进监狱
items.summary: Douglas Alves da Silva, 26, apontado pela Polícia Civil como o condutor do veículo que atropelou e arrastou Tainara Souza Santos, 31, deixou a carceragem de uma delegacia na capital e foi levado para o Centro de Detenção Provisória 2 de Guarulhos, na Grande São Paulo. Leia mais (12/09/2025 - 23h50)

items.title: Kast fala em negar benefícios a imigrantes ilegais no Chile; Jara diz que Maduro deve sair

items.summary: No debate que encerrou a corrida presidencial no Chile na noite desta terça-feira (9), José Antonio Kast deu uma terceira versão para sua proposta para reduzir o número de imigrantes ilegais, enquanto Jeannette Jara buscou colar nele a imagem de alguém que não irá fazer o que promete. Leia mais (12/09/2025 - 23h39)

items.title: Câmara aprova projeto do devedor contumaz com punição a sonegadores
items.title_zh: 商会批准对逃税者进行惩罚的贪污债务人的项目
items.summary: A Câmara dos Deputados aprovou nesta terça-feira (9) o projeto sobre o devedor contumaz, que prevê punição para empresas que deixam de pagar tributos de forma reiterada e sem justificativa e acabam obtendo vantagem competitiva sobre os concorrentes que cumprem suas obrigações fiscais. Leia mais (12/09/2025 - 23h29)

items.title: 'Mulher gostosa não sofre', diz Pocah sobre separação
items.title_zh: Pocah谈到分居时说： “性感的女人不会受苦。”
items.summary: Pocah anunciou recentemente o fim do seu relacionamento com o empresário Ronan Souza após seis anos juntos e um noivado de quatro. A cantora assumiu que não foi uma decisão repentina. "Nós não queríamos fazer comunicado anunciando a separação, mas como vazou, acabamos confirmando. Mas está tudo ótimo. Mulher gostosa não sofre." Leia mais (12/09/2025 - 23h22)

items.title: Orsi’s Divided Report Card: Why Uruguay’s Calm Politics Now Look Less Certain

Lower-income voters remain warmer to his government, while the middle and upper-income groups are drifting away. Growing fatigue on security, growth and taxes could narrow his room to expand the state or push new experiments. For […]

items.summary: Key Points The Pentagon is rolling out Google’s Gemini for Government AI platform to about three million staff through a new portal called GenAI.mil. The deal promises faster intelligence and less bureaucracy, but concentrates power and […]

items.title: ‘Daly City’ brings Indonesian American story front and center
items.title_zh: 「戴利城」将印尼裔美国人的故事带到了前沿和中心
items.summary: Told through the eyes of a young boy, a tender, clear-eyed short movie brings the Indonesian diaspora into the heart of America’s cultural conversation and in the runnings for a potential Academy Award.

items.title: Warm oceans seem to be turning even ‘weak’ cyclones deadly
items.title_zh: 温暖的海洋似乎正在使“弱”气旋变得致命
items.summary: Cyclones Ditwah and Senyar show we must prepare for storms that are weak in wind but extreme in rain.

items.title: US trade deal with Indonesia at risk of collapse, US official says
items.title_zh: 美国官员表示，美国与印度尼西亚的贸易协议面临崩溃的风险
items.summary: The two countries in July said Indonesia agreed to eliminate tariffs on more than 99 percent of US goods and scrap all non-tariff barriers facing American firms, while the US will drop threatened tariffs on Indonesian products to 19 percent from 32 percent.

items.title: Indonesia welcomes first panda born in the country
items.title_zh: 印度尼西亚欢迎在该国出生的第一只大熊猫
items.summary: Reproducing giant pandas is considered one of the greatest challenges in wildlife conservation. Female pandas are fertile only once a year, and their receptive window lasts just two to three days. The egg remains viable for only a few hours, making natural breeding success rates extremely low.

items.title: Have we not learned our lessons?
items.title_zh: 难道我们没有吸取教训吗？
items.summary: In places where communities had been trained to respond to early warnings, the difference is striking: lives and properties were spared because people knew what to do.

items.title: ‘Light’ sentencing stunts Indonesia’s corruption fight
items.title_zh: “轻判”阻碍印尼反腐败斗争
items.summary: Indonesia Corruption Watch (ICW) recently found that graft convicts only get a prison sentence of three years and three months on average and only 4 percent of total estimated state loss incurred from corruption cases can be recovered throughout 2024.

items.title: Mt. Semeru erupts, dozens of homes buried by rain lahar, hundreds flee to hills
items.title_zh: 塞梅鲁火山爆发，数十所房屋被雨水拉哈尔火山掩埋，数百人逃往山上
items.summary: The volcano has been highly active lately, with earlier eruptions occurring on Dec. 5 and Nov. 19.

items.title: Goa club fire: Police detains co-owner Ajay Gupta in Delhi
items.title_zh: 果阿俱乐部火灾：警方在德里拘留了共同所有人Ajay Gupta
items.summary: Interpol has issued a blue corner notice for nightclub co-owners Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, believed to be in Thailand, following a deadly blaze. Goa Police detained a partner and are seeking to impound the brothers' passports. A team is being sent to Thailand to bring them back, with authorities also investigating their finances.

items.title: 'End of my career': Panic spreads as US defers H-1B visa appointments in India
items.title_zh: “我的职业生涯结束” ：随着美国推迟在印度的H-1B签证预约，恐慌蔓延

items.title: Gujarat horror: 35-year-old man rapes 7-year-old girl, assaults with iron rod; held
items.title_zh: 古吉拉特邦恐怖： 35岁男子强奸7岁女孩，用铁棍殴打；被关押
items.summary: A seven-year-old girl was brutally assaulted and raped in Rajkot, with an iron rod allegedly inserted into her private parts. Police have detained 35-year-old Ramsingh, a farmhand, who confessed to the heinous crime after kidnapping the child. The victim is stable and receiving treatment, while authorities are pursuing legal action.

items.title: Threats to BLOs during SIR unacceptable: Supreme Court
items.title_zh: 在SIR不可接受期间对BLO的威胁：最高法院
items.summary: The Supreme Court has mandated all states to provide robust security for booth-level officers during voter enumeration, warning of severe action against any threats or obstructions. The court emphasized that non-cooperation with the Election Commission's work is a serious matter, extending beyond West Bengal to all states, and stressed the need for BLOs' safety to prevent anarchy.

items.title: Bengaluru shocker: Nursing student frames cabbie for gang-rape to dodge boyfriend
items.title_zh: 班加罗尔令人震惊：护理学生陷害出租车司机轮奸躲避男友
items.summary: A nursing student's gang-rape accusation against a cab driver near Bengaluru's Sir M Visvesvaraya Terminal has been debunked. Police found CCTV footage and WhatsApp chats suggesting a consensual encounter. The student reportedly fabricated the story to conceal scratch marks from her boyfriend, admitting to the false claim during questioning. The driver maintains his innocence.

items.title: Ford partners with Renault; CEO Jim Farley says it’s ‘fight for our lives’
items.title_zh: 福特与雷诺合作；首席执行官吉姆·法利（ Jim Farley ）表示，这是“为我们的生命而战”
items.summary: Facing intense competition from Chinese automakers in Europe, Ford is partnering with Renault to revive its European business. The collaboration will see Renault produce two small electric vehicles for Ford, utilizing Renault's technology platform. This strategic move aims to bolster Ford's presence in a market where it has been losing share for years.

items.title: 'Welcome to the club': Arshdeep Singh on what he told Jasprit Bumrah
items.title_zh: “欢迎来到俱乐部” ： Arshdeep Singh告诉Jasprit Bumrah
items.summary: Arshdeep Singh revealed his strategy for India's T20I win against South Africa, focusing on hitting the seam for early wickets. He dismissed two crucial batsmen, contributing to India's defense of 175. Arshdeep also welcomed Jasprit Bumrah to the 100 T20I wickets club, emphasizing the bowlers' aim to provide captaincy flexibility on a seaming wicket.

items.title: IND vs SA: 'It's not about what Hardik wants, it's about India': 'Gutsy' Pandya sparks crushing win
items.title_zh: IND vs SA ： '这不是Hardik想要什么，而是印度' ： 'Gutsy' Pandya引发了压倒性的胜利
items.summary: Hardik Pandya's explosive unbeaten 59 off 28 balls powered India to a dominant 101-run victory in the first T20I against South Africa.  Pandya's calculated counterattack, fueled by intense fitness work and a team-first approach, set a challenging target.  A potent bowling attack then dismantled the visitors, securing a commanding win.

items.title: 'Destroying entire village is not justice': Day later, Odisha’s MV-26 turns ghost village; over 160 houses gutted
items.title_zh: “摧毁整个村庄不是正义” ：一天后，奥里萨邦的MV-26变成了鬼村； 160多所房屋被摧毁
items.summary: Malkangiri Village-26, home to Bengali-origin settlers, lies in ruins after a tribal mob torched over 160 houses following the beheading of an Adivasi woman. Residents fled, fearing for their lives, as security forces searched for the victim's head. The district administration has launched a special investigation and held peace talks, urging cooperation to restore order.

items.title: Technology company CEOs caught smuggling Nvidia GPUs worth $160m to China
items.title_zh: 科技公司首席执行官发现向中国走私价值1.6亿美元的Nvidia GPU
items.summary: US authorities have busted a major smuggling ring exporting over $160 million in advanced Nvidia AI chips to China. Operation Gatekeeper led to arrests and guilty pleas, exposing a scheme using fake documents and shell companies. These powerful chips, crucial for AI and military tech, are now being kept from restricted destinations.

items.title: Lawyers Request Hospital Transfer For Jair Bolsonaro For Surgical Procedures
items.title_zh: 律师要求Jair Bolsonaro转院接受外科手术
items.summary: Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro (File)

items.title: Ashwini Vaishnaw Discusses AI, Tech Collaboration With Satya Nadella
items.title_zh: Ashwini Vaishnaw与Satya Nadella讨论人工智能、技术合作
items.summary: Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw on Tuesday met with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella.

items.title: Florida Executes Man Convicted Of 1989 Murder, Marks 18th Death In 2025
items.title_zh: 佛罗里达州处决被判犯有1989年谋杀罪的男子，标志着2025年第18次死亡
items.summary: Mark Allen Geralds was convicted of murder, armed robbery and sentenced to death in 1990

items.title: Global Trade To Surpass $35 Trillion In 2025 Driven By East Asia, Africa: UN
items.title_zh: 东亚、非洲推动2025年全球贸易额将超过35万亿$ ：联合国
items.summary: UNCTAD said manufacturing grew 10% over last four quarters compared to the previous four

items.title: Delhi Pushes For Faster, Transparent Fire NOCs After Goa Nightclub Fire
items.title_zh: 德里在果阿夜总会火灾后推动更快，更透明的消防NOC
items.summary: Chief Minister Rekha Gupta on Tuesday ordered a revamp of Delhi's fire safety NOC process.

items.title: Luthra Brothers On The Run, Co-Owner Detained Over Goa Nightclub Tragedy
items.title_zh: Luthra Brothers在逃，合伙人因果阿夜总会悲剧被拘留
items.summary: 25 people were killed in the fire at 'Birch by Romeo Lane' nightclub in Arpora in North Goa, Saturday.

items.title: Imran Khan "Kept In Illegal Isolation", Says Sister Amid Protest Outside Jail
items.title_zh: 伊姆兰汗“被非法隔离” ，姐姐在监狱外抗议时说
items.summary: Imran Khan's sister alleged that former Pakistan PM is being subjected to mistreatment in Adiala Jail.

items.title: Video: Pak Army Spokesman Winks At Woman Reporter During Presser, Faces Backlash
items.title_zh: 视频：巴基斯坦军队发言人在新闻发布会期间向女记者眨眼，面临强烈反对
items.summary: Lieutenant General Ahmed Sharif Chaudhry faced extensive backlash after he winked at a journalist

items.title: Elon Musk's X Says Would Comply With Australia's Social Media Ban
items.title_zh: 埃隆·马斯克（ Elon Musk ）的X表示将遵守澳大利亚的社交媒体禁令
items.summary: Australia became the first country to ban social media for children under 16.

items.title: From Rs 1.11 Lakh To Rs 3.45 Lakh: Odisha Approves Big Salary Hike For MLAs
items.title_zh: 从11.1万卢比到34.5万卢比：奥里萨邦批准MLA大幅加薪
items.summary: The hike is around 3.10 times for MLAs, for which the members have been demanding since 2007.

items.title: 後発地震注意情報 対象地域 引き続き日頃からの備え 確認を
items.title_zh: 将来，了解土地的最佳方式是每天访问该网站。
items.summary: 8日の青森県東方沖を震源とするマグニチュード7.5の地震で、気象庁は、千島海溝と日本海溝沿いでは巨大地震が起きる可能性がふだんより高まっているとして、「北海道・三陸沖後発地震注意情報」を出し、注意を呼びかけています。すぐに避難できるように準備しておくなど、日頃からの備えを確認してください。

items.title: 青森 八戸 小中学校多くが再開【10日の動き】後発地震注意情報
items.title_zh: 许多青森八户小学和初中重新开放【10日运动】震后预防信息
items.summary: 震度6強の揺れを観測した青森県八戸市では、9日はすべての公立の小中学校が臨時休校となりましたが、10日からほとんどの学校が授業を再開しました。「北海道・三陸沖後発地震注意情報」を受けた10日の各地の動きです。

items.title: レーダー照射 小泉防衛相“中国軍から十分な情報伝えられず”
items.title_zh: 雷达辐射小泉防卫大臣“来自中国军方的信息不足”
items.summary: 中国軍の戦闘機が航空自衛隊の戦闘機に対してレーダーを断続的に照射した問題で、小泉防衛大臣は、中国軍から事前に訓練の時間や場所など危険を回避するための十分な情報を伝えられていなかったと説明しました。

items.title: 定数削減法案 高市首相“採決時期など 国会に委ねられる”
items.title_zh: 不断削减法案高市首相“委托国会，如投票时间”
items.summary: 衆議院議員の定数削減法案をめぐり、高市総理大臣は衆議院予算委員会で、立憲民主党から今の国会で成立させる考えがあるか問われたのに対し、審議日程や採決の時期は国会での協議に委ねられるものだという認識を示しました。

items.title: 群馬 妙義山の山林火災「鎮圧」市が発表 完全な鎮火へ活動続く
items.title_zh: 樱岛市樱岛山火灾
items.summary: 群馬県の妙義山で8日に発生した山林火災について、現場の対応にあたる富岡市は、火はほぼ消し止められたとして「鎮圧した」と発表しました。県や消防は引き続き、完全な鎮火に向けて活動を続けることにしています。

items.title: 75歳の塾講師を逮捕 男子児童に水着など脱ぐよう促したか 東京
items.title_zh: 您是否逮捕了一名75岁的幼儿园教练，并敦促男孩脱掉泳衣等。东京
items.summary: 東京 あきる野市の河川敷で小学生の男子児童にわいせつな行為をした疑いで逮捕された75歳の塾講師が、川遊びをした児童に「ぬれたままだから寒いんだよ」と言って水着などを脱ぐよう促していたことが警視庁への取材で分かりました。容疑を否認しているということです。

items.title: “ゾンビたばこ” 指定薬物「エトミデート」密輸か 容疑者逮捕
items.title_zh: “僵尸香烟”指定药物“依托咪酯”走私或涉嫌逮捕
items.summary: 幻覚作用があり、「ゾンビたばこ」とも呼ばれる指定薬物「エトミデート」2キロ余りをタイから密輸したとして、59歳の容疑者が逮捕されました。警視庁は、暴力団や海外の犯罪組織が関わっているとみて調べるとともに、都内などでも乱用が広がりつつあるとして注意を呼びかけています。調べに対し、容疑を否認しているということです。

items.title: Lee orders stern probe into religious groups' alleged ties with political circle
items.title_zh: 李光耀下令严厉调查宗教团体涉嫌与政界的联系
items.summary: President Lee Jae Myung on Wednesday ordered a stern investigation into allegations of illegal ties between religious groups and politicians, his office said, amid rising controversy over the Unification Church's purported links to the political circle. Lee issued the directive a day after a special counsel referred a case involving alleged ties between the Unification Church and lawmakers from the ruling Democratic Party of Korea (DPK) to police, following criticism that its probe had previously targeted only People Power Party (PPP) lawmakers. "President Lee instructed (authorities) to conduct a thorough investigation into allegations of illegal involvement between a specific religious group and political figures, regardless of party affiliation or position," the office said in a press notice. Later in the day, a former Unification Church official embroiled in a corruption case linked to the administration of former President Yoon Suk Yeol was expected to name the DPK lawmakers he claims took money from the church during a final trial hearing. Yun Young-ho, former head of the Unificati

items.title: PM vows strict action in case of legal violations in Coupang data breach
items.title_zh: PM誓言对Coupang数据泄露中的违法行为采取严厉措施
items.summary: Prime Minister Kim Min-seok vowed Wednesday to take strict action in case violations of the law are found in the recent massive data breach at e-commerce giant Coupang. Kim made the remark at a state policy meeting amid an ongoing investigation into the leak of the personal information of nearly 34 million customers, including names, addresses and phone numbers. "The Coupang issue has gone beyond the level of serious," he said during the meeting at the government complex in Seoul. "The government will conduct a swift and accurate investigation into the cause of the accident and take strict measures against any violations of the law." The prime minister also unveiled plans to require labeling on artificial intelligence (AI)-generated material in response to what he described as the rapid spread of false and exaggerated advertising using AI. "Because some of them abuse generative AI and other new technologies, we believe they not only disrupt the market order but are serious crimes causing large damage to consumers," he said. In addition to labeling, the government plans to shorten delibera

items.title: PPP lawmaker Ihn Yohan resigns, urges nation to move past botched martial law bid
items.title_zh: PPP议员Ihn Yohan辞职，敦促国家超越拙劣的戒严令
items.summary: Rep. Ihn Yohan of the main opposition People Power Party (PPP) announced his resignation on Wednesday, calling for the nation to overcome "unfortunate events" following a failed martial law bid by former President Yoon Suk Yeol. Ihn, the first foreigner to pass the country's medical licensing examination and the first special naturalized citizen, won a proportional seat in the April 10 general elections last year. "I wish to wrap up my year and a half of parliamentary activities and return to my original profession," he said during a press conference. "Starting with myself, I am giving up all my vested interests and returning to my field to contribute to national unity and development," he added. Ihn, who had been closely aligned with Yoon, said Korea must work to overcome the "unfortunate events" that have unfolded since Yoon's failed martial law bid. With Ihn's departure, Rep. Lee So-hee, who is next in line on the proportional representation list, will take over the parliamentary seat. Ihn was appointed head of the PPP's innovation committee in October 2023 under the Yoon administration

items.title: Police raid Coupang headquarters for 2nd day over massive data breach
items.title_zh: 警方第二天突击搜查Coupang总部，涉嫌大规模数据泄露
items.summary: Police raided the headquarters of e-commerce giant Coupang for a second day Wednesday, continuing their investigation into a massive personal data leak that has affected more than 30 million customers. The cyber unit of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency sent its investigators to the Coupang headquarters in Songpa, eastern Seoul, with a search warrant to seize evidence related to the data breach, a day after they raided the compound for about 10 hours. Police launched the investigation after Coupang disclosed the massive breach of personal information belonging to 33.7 million customers, a number equivalent to more than half of the country's 52 million population. Police have reportedly secured the IP address used in the data breach and are tracking down the person who leaked the data. They are also seeking to look into potential technical vulnerabilities in Coupang's customer information management system. The search warrant specifies a Chinese national who formerly worked for Coupang as a suspect on charges of breaching the information and communications network and leaking confident

items.title: Ex-Unification Church official expected to name DPK lawmakers at embezzlement trial
items.title_zh: 前统一教会官员预计将在贪污审判中任命DPK立法者
items.summary: A former Unification Church official embroiled in a corruption case linked to the administration of former President Yoon Suk Yeol is expected to use his final trial hearing Wednesday to name the ruling Democratic Party of Korea (DPK) lawmakers he claims took money from the church, sources said. Yun Young-ho, former head of the church's global headquarters, is set to appear at the Seoul Central District Court for his 4 p.m. trial on embezzlement and other charges. Yun is accused of giving luxury gifts to former first lady Kim Keon Hee, Yoon's wife, in exchange for business favors in 2022. A key focus is whether he will use his closing arguments to name the DPK-affiliated officials and lawmakers he claims was approached by the church during the administration of former President Moon Jae-in. The disclosure would deal a severe blow to the DPK and the administration of President Lee Jae Myung, which have framed special counsel investigations into Yun and church leader Han Hak-ja as a case of corrupt ties between a religious group and the former Yoon administration. According to the sources

items.title: Lee to preside over meeting on plans to promote AI chips
items.title_zh: Lee将主持会议，讨论推广人工智能芯片的计划
items.summary: President Lee Jae Myung is set to preside over a meeting on Wednesday with business executives and experts to discuss plans to promote the semiconductor industry that produces high-performance chips for powering artificial intelligence (AI), officials said. Lee will preside over the meeting with senior executives from Samsung Electronics and SK hynix, government officials and experts from related fields to craft a comprehensive strategy as global competition intensifies to secure leadership in AI-related technologies, according to the presidential office. "Global AI competition has evolved into a battle for technological supremacy centered on semiconductors," the office said in a release. "In this context, President Lee will personally preside over the event to mobilize national capabilities to foster the semiconductor industry." Industry Minister Kim Jung-kwan will present an integrated government road map for the semiconductor sector, followed by debate sessions among participants. The strategy will include detailed plans to strengthen Korea's manufacturing capacity in both memory and

items.title: Korea secures landmark Latin American deal to sell 195 combat vehicles to Peru
items.title_zh: 韩国达成具有里程碑意义的拉丁美洲协议，向秘鲁出售195辆作战车辆
items.summary: Korea signed a framework agreement on Tuesday (local time) to supply 195 ground-combat vehicles to the Peruvian Army, marking the largest defense export deal Seoul has secured in Latin America. According to the presidential office, the deal covers Peru’s plan to acquire 54 K2 main battle tanks and 141 wheeled armored vehicles, a package to be produced through cooperation between Korean defense companies and Peru’s state-owned manufacturer. Officials said the arrangement is designed not only to modernize the Peruvian Army but also to strengthen long-term industrial ties between the two countries. Officials noted that the deal is especially significant because it sets out a clear road map for concluding the implementation contracts by next year. Once those agreements are finalized, the K2 tank will make its debut in the Latin American market, extending its reach beyond Europe for the first time. The signing ceremony in Peru on Tuesday was attended by the chief of Korea’s Defense Acquisition Program Administration, who represented the Korean government. Seoul pledged to provide close

items.title: Mic cutoff during filibuster sparks partisan clash at National Assembly
items.title_zh: 阻挠议案期间的麦克风切断引发了国民议会的党派冲突
items.summary: The ruling and opposition parties clashed at the National Assembly on Tuesday, with tensions erupting into protests after Speaker Woo Won-shik cut off the microphone during an opposition lawmaker's filibuster in a plenary session. Woo cut off the mic 13 minutes after Rep. Na Kyung-won of the main opposition People Power Party (PPP) launched the filibuster, demanding she stay on a vote on a revision to the Fair Transactions in Franchise Business Act. As Na continued her criticism of the ruling Democratic Party (DP) and the government, Woo condemned the PPP lawmaker for disrupting the session and turned off her microphone, citing the National Assembly Act. Woo was formerly a DP lawmaker before leaving the party, as South Korea bans a National Assembly speaker from holding party membership. The quarrel escalated into a clash between DP and PPP lawmakers. The PPP has been pushing for a parliamentary probe into the prosecution's recent decision not to appeal a lower court ruling related to a high-profile real estate development project in Seongnam, Gyeonggi Province. The case centers on allegat

items.title: MWL chief emphasizes unifying spirit of Islamic values at Indonesian parliament
items.title_zh: MWL首席执行官在印度尼西亚议会强调伊斯兰价值观的统一精神
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportJAKARTA — Indonesian People's Consultative Assembly Speaker Ahmad Muzani hosted Secretary General of the Makkah-based Muslim World League (MWL) and Chairman of the Association

items.title: Saudi FM, US Secretary of State discuss regional situation in phone call
items.title_zh: 美国国务卿沙特调频在电话中讨论地区局势
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportRIYADH — Saudi Minister of Foreign Affairs Prince Faisal bin Farhan held a phone call with U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio.During the call, they discussed the latest regional

items.title_zh: 沙特阿拉伯收紧受益所有权规则
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportRIYADH — Minister of Commerce Dr. Majed Al-Qasabi has approved amended rules for identifying the beneficial owner. The new rules stipulate that a natural person must hold 25 percent

items.title: Crown Prince discusses bilateral ties with presidents of Syria and Indonesia in phone calls
items.title_zh: 王储通过电话与叙利亚和印度尼西亚总统讨论双边关系
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportRIYADH — Crown Prince and Prime Minister Mohammed bin Salman received a telephone call from Syrian President Ahmed al-Sharaa on Tuesday. During the call, they reviewed aspects of

items.title: Saudi Arabia sees seasonal rainfall peak shift from November to December, NCM says
items.title_zh: NCM表示，沙特阿拉伯的季节性降雨高峰从11月转移到12月
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportJEDDAH — Saudi Arabia is witnessing a notable shift in its rainfall patterns, with the annual peak moving from November to December, according to new scientific assessments by the

items.title: Trilateral Committee meeting in Tehran welcomes steady progress in Saudi-Iranian relations
items.title_zh: 三方委员会在德黑兰举行会议，欢迎沙特-伊朗关系取得稳步进展
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportRIYADH — The third meeting of the Saudi-Chinese-Iranian Trilateral Committee to follow up on the Beijing Agreement welcomed the continuous progress in the entire gamut of Saudi-Iranian

items.title: Al-Falih: Private sector to contribute 40% of $500 billion infrastructure investments in coming years
items.title_zh: Al-Falih ：私营部门将在未来几年贡献5000亿美元基础设施投资的40%
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportRIYADH — Minister of Investment Khalid Al-Falih said that Saudi Arabia is working towards achieving net-zero carbon emissions by 2060 through massive investments in infrastructure.

items.title: Crown Prince inaugurates new facilities at King Salman Air Base
items.title_zh: 王储为萨勒曼国王空军基地的新设施揭幕
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportRIYADH — Crown Prince and Prime Minister Mohammed bin Salman inaugurated on Tuesday new facilities at King Salman Air Base in the Central Sector. This is part of strategic projects

items.title: Al-Tuwaijri: NDF contributes SR47 billion to the non-oil GDP
items.title_zh: Al-Tuwaijri ： NDF为非石油GDP贡献了470亿里亚尔
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportRIYADH — Riyadh Emir Prince Faisal bin Bandar inaugurated the Development Finance Conference (MOMENTUM 2025) at the King Abdulaziz International Conference Center in Riyadh on Tuesday.

items.title: Jeddah sees scattered rainfall as residents flock to parks amid cloudy skies
items.title_zh: 吉达看到分散的降雨，因为居民在多云的天空中涌向公园
items.summary: Saudi Gazette reportJEDDAH — Scattered rain fell Tuesday on Jeddah and its surrounding centers, soaking the ground and drawing residents outdoors to enjoy the cooler weather. #VIDEO: Rainfall in northern
